arts.ttl: St. Pauli confidence soaring after record-breaking Augsburg win
arts.sum: The 2025/26 Bundesliga season may only be three games old, but St. Pauli fans can be forgiven for getting more than a little carried away with their team’s superb start to the campaign. Hountondji is the first St. Pauli player to score in each of his team's opening three games of a Bundesliga season.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli make historic unbeaten start after coming from behind to defeat Augsburg
arts.sum: St. Pauli made it seven points from their opening three Bundesliga games after defeating Augsburg 2-1 at the Millerntor, with Daniel Sinani's late free-kick securing a massive three points for Alexander Blessin's side. The strike made history, as Hountondji became the first player ever to score in each of St. Pauli's first three matches of a Bundesliga season!

arts.ttl: Sinani's free-kick ensures St.Pauli defeat Augsburg
arts.sum: Danel Sinani's late free-kick proved to be the difference as St.Pauli defeated FC Augsburg 2-1.

St. Pauli earned bragging rights over fierce city rivals Hamburg two weeks ago as goals from Adam Dzwigala and Andreas Hountondji sealed a memorable triumph at the Volksparkstadion. After a challengin...

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs Augsburg preview: Hosts aim to extend unbeaten start
arts.sum: FC St. Pauli will look to extend their unbeaten start to the Bundesliga when they host Sandro Wagner’s new-look Augsburg side at the Millerntor-Stadion on Sunday.
